object.name: OwnedGiftRegular
object.description: Describes a regular gift owned by a user or a chat.
object.html_description: Describes a regular gift owned by a user or a chat.
object.rst_description: Describes a regular gift owned by a user or a chat.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the gift for the bot; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. Unique identifier of the gift for the bot; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Unique identifier of the gift for the bot; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.name: owned_gift_id

annotations.description: Sender of the gift if it is a known user
annotations.html_description: Optional. Sender of the gift if it is a known user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Sender of the gift if it is a known user
annotations.name: sender_user

annotations.description: Date the gift was sent in Unix time
annotations.html_description: Date the gift was sent in Unix time
annotations.rst_description: Date the gift was sent in Unix time
annotations.name: send_date

annotations.description: Text of the message that was added to the gift
annotations.html_description: Optional. Text of the message that was added to the gift
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Text of the message that was added to the gift
annotations.name: text

annotations.description: Special entities that appear in the text
annotations.html_description: Optional. Special entities that appear in the text
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Special entities that appear in the text
annotations.name: entities

annotations.description: True, if the sender and gift text are shown only to the gift receiver; otherwise, everyone will be able to see them
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the sender and gift text are shown only to the gift receiver; otherwise, everyone will be able to see them
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the sender and gift text are shown only to the gift receiver; otherwise, everyone will be able to see them
annotations.name: is_private

annotations.description: True, if the gift is displayed on the account's profile page; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the gift is displayed on the account's profile page; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the gift is displayed on the account's profile page; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.name: is_saved

annotations.description: True, if the gift can be upgraded to a unique gift; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the gift can be upgraded to a unique gift; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the gift can be upgraded to a unique gift; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.name: can_be_upgraded

annotations.description: True, if the gift was refunded and isn't available anymore
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the gift was refunded and isn't available anymore
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the gift was refunded and isn't available anymore
annotations.name: was_refunded

annotations.description: Number of Telegram Stars that can be claimed by the receiver instead of the gift; omitted if the gift cannot be converted to Telegram Stars
annotations.html_description: Optional. Number of Telegram Stars that can be claimed by the receiver instead of the gift; omitted if the gift cannot be converted to Telegram Stars
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Number of Telegram Stars that can be claimed by the receiver instead of the gift; omitted if the gift cannot be converted to Telegram Stars
annotations.name: convert_star_count

annotations.description: Number of Telegram Stars that were paid by the sender for the ability to upgrade the gift
annotations.html_description: Optional. Number of Telegram Stars that were paid by the sender for the ability to upgrade the gift
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Number of Telegram Stars that were paid by the sender for the ability to upgrade the gift
annotations.name: prepaid_upgrade_star_count
